(Assume that the human protein database was produced from a FASTA file containing one copy of each human protein.)

Describe in pseudocode a procedure for identifying all replicated genes in the human genome. In other words, how would you repeat this analysis for ALL human proteins, listing those with at least one paralog? You pseudocode may or may not resemble the actual computer code, but MUST include all the required steps.

column2: t see any if condition to check if there is a pending action.
If the debounce button is clicked only once, the debounce function
gets called after the delay. However, if the debounce button is
clicked once, and again clicked prior to the end of the delay, the
initial delay is cleared and a fresh delay timer is started. The
clearTimeout function is being used to achieve it.

column1: So everytime the button is clicked, the timer is cleared and a new timer is started (and probably the new action is also triggered), which probably doesn&#39
